title: MapLocs App For iOS And Android Platforms Launched
text:
MapLocs, an app for iOS and Android platforms has become a comprehensive platform for users to search and find places around them that matter.
When one gets to a new destination, it can be quite tricky to find new local places. Thatâ€™s where this app comes into the picture by creating a combination of maps and locations. Thus MapLocs enables users to find their favorite places in the area without having to look for built in apps that offer rudimentary directions.
The app works by letting users find places with the help of location detection functionality in the phone. One can also type in the place to eat, shop, drink or sleep and find it quite easily. Right from hospitals to ATMs, cafes; users can look at 70 categories in all to get to the places they need to without any hassle.
One of the advantages of the app is that it has an easy to use interface and users can find places within a specific distance. The app uses GPS for accurate location detection. What makes the app stand out from the rest is the search field on results page to further filter by preferred places. This place filter functionality is one of the major highlights of the app that makes things even simpler for users with the call button that connects to the chosen place.
There are ratings to offer users a guide about the places of interest. One can also add or delete items in the list of their favorites in nearby places. There are no ads to deal with either and users get a convenient experience on their chosen platform at their fingertips.
About MapLocs
It is an app for iOS and Android users, which allows them to locate places around them that matter.
